I have started with very basic rooms, objects and exits.
When in town I can visit buildings (rooms), however when I enter those rooms, I would prefer to see room description before anything else, right now its looks like this

-You are in a room
-You can exit the room
-Room description
I would really like for room description to appear first, before any interaction with that room
Thanks

Posts.EditableText: On the Game object - select Room Descriptions and then set the boxes to the order you want. In order top to bottom I have mine set as 1, 4, 3, 2 because I like to see the Location Name first followed by its description and then the exits and any visible objects.
